definition: Lao She (1899-1966), Chinese novelist and dramatist
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
to be preoccupied (idiom)/to be inattentive/to be frightened out of one's mind

pinyin: Ba1 er3 she3 fu1 si1 ji1

sentences.english: 22 and immediately they left the boat and their father and followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他們連忙舍了船，別了父親，跟從了耶穌。

sentences.english: His heart desired this, so he decided to go to Shewei country and learn Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 他心中十分嚮往，便想去舍衛國觀光並修學佛法。

sentences.english: Help the champs in shooting and get the benefit with a lot of shooting, striking and fighting.
sentences.chinese: 助在拍的香榭舍大街，得到了很多拍的利益，打和力。

sentences.english: On my way there, I thought about the village, the school and the children there.
sentences.chinese: 在自己地途中，自己想到啦村莊，黌舍和那邊地孩子。

sentences.english: It is not proper to exaggerate influences of the former Soviet Union scholar Steherbastsky s writings in China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，鄭文過分誇大了舍爾巴茨基著作在中國的影響。

sentences.english: He created a new record in hellogh-jump at our school sports.
sentences.chinese: 在咱們黌舍的運動會上，他創造了跳高新紀錄。

sentences.english: students attend a boarding school would cultivate their independence as apart from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 分開怙恃上寄宿黌舍的學生將會培育他們的自力性。

sentences.english: The school challenged us to a game of football.
sentences.chinese: 那所黌舍向本人們應戰賽場足球。

sentences.english: John's wife left him for another man.
sentences.chinese: 約翰的妻子舍他而去，投入另一個男子的懷抱。

sentences.english: I always remember the day when I first came to this school.
sentences.chinese: 我往往記得我第一次來黌舍的那一天。

sentences.english: Teluk Meranti's four schools serve chelloldren ages 5 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 德魯科梅蘭蒂的四所黌舍接收5到18歲的孩子。

sentences.english: Have take of people, how happy meaner miser is unfortunate.
sentences.chinese: 有取有舍的人多麼幸福，寡情的守財奴才是不幸。

sentences.english: Local Villa is a high-end restaurant makes Chongqing style hot-pot.
sentences.chinese: 渝舍是一家經營重慶火鍋的高檔門店。

sentences.english: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!
sentences.chinese: 他們舍真主而敬事許多神靈，希望自己獲得援助。

sentences.english: on the other hand, the contribution of day schools can't be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，日製黌舍的進獻是不克不及輕忽的。

sentences.english: Mr Liu is of the best teachers in our school.
sentences.chinese: 劉教授是我們黌舍最好的教授之一。

definition: reluctant to part with (sth or sb)/unwilling to let go of
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
reluctant to leave/to hate to have to go/to recall fondly
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
to have a sentimental attachment to (a place)/to miss (one's ancestral home etc)/to be nostalgic about
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to see each other/to meet in person
not to have room to put sth/to be unable to let go
